SCRIPT.MSCRI: :PUT_PROMPT_BUFFER UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME# = &UC4RB_DELETE_FILE# :PUT_PROMPT_BUFFER UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_FAIL# = "NO" :PUT_PROMPT_BUFFER AGENT# = &AGENT# :PUT_PROMPT_BUFFER LOGIN# = &LOGIN# :SET &ACTOBJ# = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT("PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.ACTION.DELETE", WAIT) :IF &ACTOBJ# = "0" : SET &ERRNR# = SYS_LAST_ERR_NR() : SET &ERRINS# = SYS_LAST_ERR_INS() : SET &MESSAGE# = GET_MSG_TXT(&ERRNR#,&ERRINS#) : PRINT &ERRNR# &ERRINS# &MESSAGE# :ENDIF
